question: As per the Draft Electricity (Rights of Consumers) Rules, 2020 released by the Power Ministry, what is the time line for providing a new connection in metro cities?
explanation:
A draft of Electricity (Rights of Consumers) Rules 2020 has been prepared by the Ministry of Power for the first time.
As per the regulations, the time period to provide new electricity connection and modify existing connection in metro cities is not more than 7 days and in rural areas is not more than 30 days.
